text: aur jo log apane rab ko usakee khushee kee chaah mein praatah aur saayankaal pukaarate rahate hai, aise logon ko door na karana. unake hisaab kee tumapar kuchh bhee zimmedaaree nahin hai aur na tumhaare hisaab kee unapar koee zimmedaaree hai ki tum unhen door karo aur phir ho jao atyaachaariyon mein se
